winners.tagline: Research papers, re-imagined with AI - summarised & visualized!

description_sections.heading: Inspiration
description_sections.content: Arxiv is impossible to go through, October 2023 had over 20K+ papers released! If you don't read them all, how can you keep up? Perhaps you listen to those pesky LinkedIn influencers ... or you could use Bulletpapers , the smarter way to learn fast.

description_sections.heading: What it does
description_sections.content: Summarises entire research papers (thanks 100K Context!) -> gives you the bulletpoints! Distills technical jargon in new research papers into something anyone can understand, in seconds. Creates a TikTok style video about the paper (learn about new papers on your commute!) See the history of the topic with Bullet Time, see how the field has progressed Talk to 'Bullet', our friendly AI assistant, who will help you to learn more about the topic..

description_sections.heading: How we built it
description_sections.content: Using Claude for all of our AI, SDXL tuning to generate paper covers, Langchain for prompt engineering, FFMPEG for video generation, ElevenLabs for TTS, HuggingFace for embeddings!

description_sections.heading: Challenges we ran into
description_sections.content: Processing unstructured papers, generating AI imagery for every single element - and doing so at scale!

description_sections.heading: Built With
description_sections.content: claude elevenlabs ffmpeg langchain next.js postgresql python stablediffusion text2speech

winners.tagline: Designed to seamlessly integrate with data from a multitude of sources, this platform empowers you to converse directly with your health information

description_sections.heading: Inspiration
description_sections.content: In today's digital age, people are generating vast amounts of health data from various sources, from fitness trackers to medical records. Yet, understanding and harnessing this data for personal benefit remains a challenge for many. We envisioned "aGP Chat" to bridge the gap between raw data and actionable insights, offering a platform where individuals can converse directly with their health data.

description_sections.heading: What it does
description_sections.content: "aGP Chat" is a dynamic health insights dashboard. It allows users to upload and integrate health data from diverse sources and engage in an interactive chat with it, using a GPT-like AI. The chat interface simplifies the process of extracting insights, identifying preventative treatments, and observing trends in one's health.

description_sections.heading: How we built it
description_sections.content: We utilized state-of-the-art AI frameworks and combined them with robust data integration tools. The backend processes vast datasets while the frontend provides a user-friendly chat interface, mimicking the experience of talking to a general practitioner.

description_sections.heading: Challenges we ran into
description_sections.content:
Ensuring the seamless integration of varied data sources while maintaining data privacy. Designing an AI model that can make sense of diverse and sometimes conflicting data to offer accurate health insights. Simplifying the user experience to make it accessible to individuals without technical backgrounds. Accomplishments that we're proud of

Successful integration of multiple data streams while upholding strict privacy standards. Enabling real-time health insights through an intuitive chat interface. Positive feedback from early users who found "aGP Chat" beneficial in understanding their health data. What we learned

The immense potential of conversational AI in the health sector. The importance of data security and user trust in health-related applications. Challenges and solutions related to parsing and understanding complex health data. What's next for aGP Chat

We aim to expand our data integration capabilities, incorporating even more health data sources. Additionally, partnerships with healthcare professionals are on the horizon to further validate and enhance our AI's predictive capabilities. Our ultimate goal is to become the go-to platform for personalized health insights and proactive care.

winners.tagline: Learn to prompt Claude through games.

description_sections.heading: Inspiration
description_sections.content: Prompting is something new and likely going to be very important, so it seems useful to have tools to teach people how to do it more effectively. It empowers people to understand how to reach their goals with LLMs, while capturing the playful nature of learning by doing.

description_sections.heading: What it does
description_sections.content: You play a game to learn to prompt engineer effectively.

description_sections.heading: How we built it
description_sections.content: We used different games, Pong, Minesweeper and HumanEval as the base to create a controlled environment to evaluate how effectively you are prompting Claude. We used Claude as the AI you are prompting and Next JS, React and deployed with Vercel.

description_sections.heading: Challenges we ran into
description_sections.content:
The game was initially too trivial. It was challenging to make it hard enough that you are learning to prompt effectively, the first version we had too much context in the prompt. We had to carefully remove excess context.

Learning to effectively prompt with anthropic.

We had to provide helpful nudges for users so that when it is challenging they can make progress and improve their prompting. This used a second Claude API integration that integrates a chatbot.

What we built is just with one function, which is very limiting for any kind of substantial software you'd need to have multiple functions chained together.
